description:
Howard Link is a subordinate of http://anidb.net/ch32502 [Central] Inspector http://anidb.net/ch32795 [Malcolm C. Lvellie]. A former member of http://anidb.net/ch84585 [CROW], he was assigned to act as http://anidb.net/ch84637 [Allen Walker]`s observer/guardian after Allen fell under suspicion for being connected to http://anidb.net/ch84602 [the 14th Noah].
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki
name: Howard Link
